title: Новая реальность
overview: A new crisis in a few days rewritten all plans, canceled business, destroyed dreams. How have we and our ideas about the world changed? What happens next? Will it happen again? Here are two views of the situation: from April and August 2020. And five key topics — work, family, medicine, debt, and the second wave of the epidemic. In the new reality understand journalists Alexander Organov and Igor Makarov, together with experts, entrepreneurs and ordinary people.
